DOC.brief_summary: Acute patients in Denmark are often admitted to Emergency Departments by their General Practitioner with a presumptive diagnosis. The aim of this study is to evaluate the diagnostic value of the pre-admission presumptive diagnosis and to assess if the presumptive diagnosis could be replaced by a number of symptom-based groups.
DOC.brief_title: Complaints and Presumptive Diagnosis in a Danish Emergency Department
DOC.criteria: all acute patients admitted to emergency department
